alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Bradford, northwestern St. Johns, southern Baker, north central Putnam, northeastern Union, east central Columbia, Clay and western Duval Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sanderson to near Bostwick. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Starke, Raiford, Middleburg, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Maxville, George`s Lake, Olustee and Camp Blanding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Putnam
